category.name: Active Workspace
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_root_types_for_paragraph_number
preference.preference_description: Defines the types for root revision of a structure which should have the property arm1ParaNumber calculated for its children. The sub types are also matched. If the root type or its parent type is not included in this preference; the value of arm1ParaNumber would be empty for the entire structure. The changes to this preference will take effect after re-login.
